alert.note: Alert for Northern Monterey Bay; Northern Salinas Valley, Hollister Valley and Carmel Valley; Southern Monterey Bay and Big Sur Coast; Southern Salinas Valley, Arroyo Seco and Lake San Antonio (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 05 at 9:45AM PST until January 05 at 11:00AM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility of one quarter mile to one half mile in dense fog. * WHERE...Southern Salinas Valley/Arroyo Seco and Lake San Antonio, Southern Monterey Bay and Big Sur Coast, Northern Monterey Bay and Northern Salinas Valley/Hollister Valley and Carmel Valley. * WHEN...Until 11 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Satellite imagery is showing improvement but with vis still low in the valley, the product was extended another hour.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Northern Monterey Bay; Northern Salinas Valley, Hollister Valley and Carmel Valley; Southern Monterey Bay and Big Sur Coast; Southern Salinas Valley, Arroyo Seco and Lake San Antonio
